message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiating to find a mutually beneficial price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still not willing to sell it for $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to consider your latest offer. My counteroffer is $860000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not convinced that $860000 is a fair price for this exceptional product. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $880000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering the product's value, I believe we can come to a reasonable price. My counteroffer is $870000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $870000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $890000. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that is fair for both parties. My counteroffer is $880000.

I'm disappointed that we're still not able to agree on a price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach an agreement. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. This is the absolute lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and uniqueness.
After much consideration, I believe we can come to a fair agreement. My final counteroffer is $890000.
